content:
Sure, here are some suggestions on what you might want to bring with you to an outdoor concert in Fort Worth:

1. Sunscreen and sunglasses to protect you from the sun.
2. A hat or visor to shade your face and head.
3. A light jacket or sweater for when the temperature drops in the evening.
4. A blanket or lawn chair to sit on.
5. A reusable water bottle to stay hydrated.
6. Snacks or light food that are easy to carry and not messy.
7. Binoculars if you have them, to get a closer look at the performers.
8. Cash or credit card for food and drink purchases.

Be sure to check the event website or contact the organizers to see if there are any restrictions on what you can bring with you. Have fun!
